subject: Remove Crystalline identity from all 7 tracks
description: Kill Crystalline (Lydian, spacious, hard-right) across entire album. Replace with coherent accompaniment guitar that complements the Phrygian/main riff. Specific changes: Track 5 becomes single-identity D Phrygian with complementary 2nd guitar, Track 7 Harmony section stays E Major not Lydian, all ride-sparse drum patterns replaced, all Crystalline naming removed.
